uncertainty.translation[0].definitions[0: when you feel doubt about what will happen
Times of great change are also times of uncertainty.
There is a great deal of uncertainty about the company’s future.
uncertainty.translation[0].definitions[1: a situation which you are not sure about because you do not know what will happen
uncertainty.translation[1].definitions[0: a situation when what will happen in the future is likely to change, often in a way that is bad
Exchange rate uncertainty is bound to reduce investment.
The announcement ends months of uncertainty over the contract’s future.
